course.subject: ENVS
course.name: Conservation of Coastal Areas in Lantau
course.description: This course engages students in practical training and enriches their knowledge and skills in relevant areas such as marine ecology and biodiversity of various coastal habitats, species identification in field trips, environmental education in eco-guided tours. The students will also have a chance to contribute and connect to the society through extended participation with local community projects. Approval of the course coordinator is needed for students to enroll in this course. For ENVS students in their third and fourth year of study only.
